title: Sara Sweetman
deck:
I'm Mum to Emily, Mathilda, Verity, Noah and Adam.

I've been coming to Gateway for well over 10 years. I love Gateway!

I was part of the Gateway Toddlers team for 10 years and I now lead Acomb Babies along with Sue Downing and Suzanne Cooke.

Outside of Gateway I enjoy the gym, books, and time with family and friends.
